inputStyled: h-11 bg-white dark:bg-slate-700 w-full pl-2 dark:text-white text-black border-black border-[1px] rounded-[4px] border-opacity-30 outline-none focus:border-blue-700 placeholder-gray-300 placeholder-opacity-0 transition duration-200
spanStyled: text-opacity-80 dark:text-white text-black dark:bg-slate-700 text-gray-600 bg-white absolute left-3 -top-[2px] px-1 transition duration-200 input-text
